I have this late 19th century baseball trade card for sale or trade.
It is a H804-4 Capadura Cigar Trade Card - Behind the bat.
I have been told it is trimmed, but I don't know much else about it.

I collect T206, T205, and T201 cards as well as vintage football memoribilia.
Email me at kjjavic@aol.com with any questions/offers

thanks
Keith
